titleStmt.title: Kalendarium humanæ vitæ. = The kalender of mans life. Authore Roberto Farlæo. Scoto Britannio
titleStmt.author: Farlie, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Cotes] for William Hope, and are to be sould at ye vnicorne neare the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Latin and English verse on facing pages.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A⁴ (+ an unsigned leaf after A1) B-K.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: ye vnicorne neare the Royall Exchange
